/usr/bin/arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++ --sysroot=/path/to/sysroot    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/Adapters/AudioAdapter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/Adapters/HMIAdapter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/Adapters/MQTTAdapter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/StateMachine/IDLEState.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/StateMachine/CancelTimerState.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/StateMachine/CenterState.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/StateMachine/EventTable.cpp.o  -o project  -L/path/to/sysroot/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf:/home/duoctdt/CrossEXProject/build/Utils Utils/libUtils.so -lpthread -lasound -lmosquitto -ldl -lrt
